level.heading: GRANT APPLICATION PROCEDURES FOR THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS (ยง 21-1302)

level.text: Any institution wishing to be considered for a grant shall submit a written application for each grant. The application shall include the following:
A detailed work plan or proposal with a schedule for completion of the work;
The names and resumes of the principal and assistant investigators or researchers, listing the qualifying education and experience of each;
The type of technical or personnel assistance that the grantee will require from DPW;
The name and qualifying education and experience of any subcontractors to be used;
A detailed budget estimate of all direct and indirect costs associated with the grant; and
